aspect_summaries.rooms: I reserved this room through an affiliate travel booking platform and got a great room rate. Room was ready very early in the morning for us.
aspect_summaries.location: Aprox. We flew into SEA TAC for a few days before our cruise and our travel agent recommended this hotel. Downtown Seattle was about a 30 minute ride by light rail service (cost of $16 for the 4 of us) or $40 cab ride to the pier.
aspect_summaries.service: The staff was friendly and we appreciated the cookies after a long flight when we were waiting to check inn. I think it is fair to mention it costs to use internet in your room but for business travlers I suppose that is an expected cost. Late check in was effortless and was greeted with a warmed cookie.
